function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on digital infrastructure may lead to cyber security vulnerabilities and data privacy risks.","Impact":"Potential data breaches and loss of sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust cyber security measures and data privacy regulations.","Technologies":"Encryption, secure networks, and data protection software.","People":"Water utility organizations, citizens, and policy makers.","Owner":"IT and security professionals."},{"Description":"Rapid development of digital twins and IoT integration may lead to technical errors and malfunctions.","Impact":"Disruption in operations and inaccurate data analytics.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing, regular maintenance, and ensuring backup systems.","Technologies":"IoT sensors, data validation algorithms, and predictive maintenance tools.","People":"IT professionals and infrastructure operators.","Owner":"IT and operations management teams."},{"Description":"Increase in public reliance on waterhumandata may lead to misinformation and panic during outbreaks or challenging conditions.","Impact":"Negative public perception, misinformation, and unnecessary panic.","Mitigation":"Implementing transparent communication strategies and ensuring data accuracy and reliability.","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, real-time monitoring, and public awareness platforms.","People":"Citizens, policy makers, and water service providers.","Owner":"Public relations and communication professionals."}]}
